mapper.select: SELECT subjecttype.SUBJECTTYPE_ID, subjecttype.SCHOOL_ID, subjecttype.DIC_ID, dic.NAME FROM SC_SUBJECTTYPE subjecttype LEFT JOIN SYS_DICTIONARIES dic ON dic.DIC_ID = subjecttype.DIC_ID WHERE subjecttype.SCHOOL_ID = #{SCHOOL_ID} ORDER BY subjecttype.DIC_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_SUBJECTTYPE (SUBJECTTYPE_ID, SCHOOL_ID, DIC_ID) VALUES (#{SUBJECTTYPE_ID}, #{SCHOOL_ID}, #{DIC_ID})
